title: Kamala Harris, Donald Trump Race To US Election Photo Finish
content: Kamala Harris and Donald Trump set out Friday on the final 10-week sprint to election day, with the Democrat surging after an electrifying speech accepting the Democratic Party nomination.
summary: Kamala Harris and Donald Trump set out Friday on the final 10-week sprint to election day, with the Democrat surging after an electrifying speech accepting the Democratic Party nomination.

title: Worst Volcanic Activity In 50 Years In Iceland After Major Volcano Eruption
content: A volcanic eruption has begun again on a peninsula adjacent to Iceland's capital Reykjavik, the sixth time lava has emerged in the area in the space of a year. The Lava burst to the surface at 9:26 p.m. local time on Thursday.
summary: A volcanic eruption has begun again on a peninsula adjacent to Iceland's capital Reykjavik, the sixth time lava has emerged in the area in the space of a year. The Lava burst to the surface at 9:26 p.m. local time on Thursday.

title: In PM Modi's Historic Ukraine Visit, A Hug And Handshake With Zelensky
content: The two leaders are scheduled to hold both one-on-one and delegation-level talks with a focus on ways to find a negotiated settlement to the Russia-Ukraine conflict.
summary: The two leaders are scheduled to hold both one-on-one and delegation-level talks with a focus on ways to find a negotiated settlement to the Russia-Ukraine conflict.

title: New Book Reveals What Queen Elizabeth Thought About Donald Trump
content: Late Queen Elizabeth II thought former US President Donald Trump was "very rude", a new biography revealed.
summary: Late Queen Elizabeth II thought former US President Donald Trump was "very rude", a new biography revealed.

title: Humpback Whale Freed From Entanglement After 22-Hour Rescue In Sydney
content: A juvenile humpback whale was freed Friday after it was entangled in ropes and buoys in the harbour of Australia's largest city for 22 hours.
summary: A juvenile humpback whale was freed Friday after it was entangled in ropes and buoys in the harbour of Australia's largest city for 22 hours.

title: Gaza Mother Separated From Triplets By War Fears "Will Die Without Them"
content: As their first birthday approaches, the triplets Gaza-native Hanane Bayouk gave birth to in Jerusalem before the war have seen their mother just once, and she fears she will "die without them".
summary: As their first birthday approaches, the triplets Gaza-native Hanane Bayouk gave birth to in Jerusalem before the war have seen their mother just once, and she fears she will "die without them".

title: Explained: Why Andrew Tate Has Been Placed Under House Arrest
content: Andrew Tate, who has often courted criticism for his misogynistic views, appeared in court alongside his brother Tristan, who, too, was placed under special judicial control.
summary: Andrew Tate, who has often courted criticism for his misogynistic views, appeared in court alongside his brother Tristan, who, too, was placed under special judicial control.

title: Video: Thai Politician Slaps Woman Reporter For Asking Question
content: Thailand's parliament has said that it will investigate veteran politician and former army chief Prawit Wongsuwon after he was filmed slapping a journalist as she tried to ask him questions.
summary: Thailand's parliament has said that it will investigate veteran politician and former army chief Prawit Wongsuwon after he was filmed slapping a journalist as she tried to ask him questions.

title: In This Country, You Have The Right To Ignore Your Bosses After Hours
content: Australians can ignore their bosses outside of work hours, according to a new law brought to tackle work-related mental health issues.
summary: Australians can ignore their bosses outside of work hours, according to a new law brought to tackle work-related mental health issues.

title: When Will Sunita Williams Come Back To Earth? Nasa Shares Big Update
content: Astronauts Sunita Williams and Butchwilmore have been stuck in space since June 6 and are hoping to make their way back to Earth soon, but NASA says they may have to spend the next few days in uncertainty too.
summary: Astronauts Sunita Williams and Butchwilmore have been stuck in space since June 6 and are hoping to make their way back to Earth soon, but NASA says they may have to spend the next few days in uncertainty too.

title: Who is Maya Harris, Sister Of US Vice President Kamala Harris
content: Maya Harris was the campaign chairperson during Kamala Harris' first presidential campaign in 2020.

title: "Now Is The Time To...": What Kamala Harris Said On Gaza War

title: Five Key Takeaways From The Democratic National Convention
content: It was Kamala Harris's big night Thursday but she wasn't the only US Democrat to knock it out of the park during a week of rousing speeches, celebrity cameos and lashings of hope and joy.

title: "Our Auntie": All About Kamala Harris' Nieces And Nephews

title: All About Kamala Harris' Mother, Who Grew Up In India And Moved To US

title: "Star Of My Life": All About Kamala Harris' Mother, Shyamala Gopalan
content: When US Vice President Kamala Harris talks about her South Asian identity, it's usually in the context of her mother, Shyamala Gopalan. The same was true on Thursday during Ms Harris' speech on the fourth night of the DNC.

title: Instagram, TikTok Stars Get VIP Treatment At Kamala Harris' Democrat Event
content: The Kamala Harris campaign rolled out the blue carpet for social media influencers at the Democratic National Convention this week, hoping that they can help get out the vote to beat Donald Trump.
